privacyContent: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.

Data Collection: We do not collect any personal data or information from users of the Marine Knots app. The app functions completely offline and does not require or collect any personal information, usage data, or analytics.
Information Storage: All app data is stored locally on your device. We do not have access to your device or any information stored within the app.
Third-Party Services: Our app does not integrate with any third-party services that collect user data.
Changes to Privacy Policy: Any changes to this privacy policy will be reflected in app updates and on this website.
If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us through the app store.
